name: places/ChIJkfJ-qCBewokRm8TLAIrVZTE
formattedAddress: 925 Park Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 925 Park Ave, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Grigoriy Mashkevich and your team!  You are the best!  Thank you so much for taking care of me.

To make the decision to trust somebody with your face it’s not an easy task.
It took me a long time to finally pull the trigger and go for a facelift, upper and lower eyelid surgery with skin Lazer.
I made the best decision by choosing Dr. Mashkevich.
Granted I came all the way from Florida to NY to make it happen.  I interviewed few other doctors in my area but my intuition took me to this place and all the efforts of travelling were well worth it.    My initial appointment with Dr. Mashkevich was virtual and I trusted him with all his recommendations wholeheartedly although other doctors had some different ones.

I am a little after 6 weeks post-op and absolutely love what I see in the mirror.  What a transformation and makeover!
Dr. Mashkevich is the artist and the master of his trade.     I can’t be thankful enough!  I could not even imagine such pleasing results.   He changed my life!

I was so nervous, but his staff was absolutely amazing and they did everything to make me comfortable.  They were very supportive, comforting, patient, kind, incredibly helpful and more.  They helped me to go through some bumps with my pre-op process and all the way to the end.  The recovery in the first couple of days can be rough but it’s well worth it in the end.
His complimentary nurse on the first night is priceless and helped tremendously!  No other doctors have this offer.

In the future whatever needs I have with my face; he is the only doctor I will go to and trust with.
I am grateful forever!  God Bless!

originalText.text:
If you are not happy with your nose or have breathing problems the only doctor I would recommend is dr. Mashkevich. I never had a breathing problems but my nose was big. It bothered me since I was a teenager but I knew that’s a very difficult surgery. I was scared. I was doing my research 10 years. I was going to multiple plastics surgeons for consultations and never got 100% confidence.  When I met dr. Mashkevich, he looked at my nose inside and outside, I asked 100 questions which he passionately answered with all the details. Also, he did simulation images and explained what needs to be corrected, he made me feel very comfortable about the procedure. In conversation with my friend, she told me that she is going to do her nose. It’s ended up that she is going to dr. Mashkevich as well, and two of her friends did rhinoplasty with him, and they are extremely happy with the result. This news definitely made feel me even more confident. Today is one week after my surgery. I just had the bandage removed and I wanted to cry how happy I was to see my new nose. Even it still swelling a little bit but it so beautiful! Cannot stop looking at the mirror. The only regret I have that I didn’t meet dr. Mashkevich 10 years ago when I first started to think about rhinoplasty!
The whole his team is so nice and very well organized! While I was waiting for my surgery a lot of questions were coming up, and the girls from the office were getting the answers for me always. All his staff is very professional and attentive! Dr. Mashkevich and his team is the only place I would trust to do my nose!!! Thank you so much for making me so beautiful!!!

originalText.text:
Three days ago was 4 months since I had rhinoplasty with Dr Mashkevich. Every day I realize more and more that I made the right decision when I decided to have this procedure and even more when I decided to have it with Dr Mashkevich. I could not be happier. My nose looks unbelievably natural. Its perfect plastic surgery – still me, but better, improved version))). When I was going for the consultation in March I was 50/50, not sure if I would ever do it. I wanted to have my nose done for long time, but never was certain or brave enough to actually proceed.  Too many concerns, too many fears of the complications, etc. I knew I had to find the “right” surgeon. As soon as I left Doc’s office after the consult,  I was 100% sure I should and I would get it done.

I love love love, absolutely love his approach. Dr Mashkevish is perfectionist when it comes to his work. So meticulous, so patient.

Consultation was super informative, he answered all my questions (if you do schedule one-come prepared, have all your questions ready).

Scheduling and financial questions were discussed with Polina, one of the staff members, fast and efficient. Overall, I need to say everybody in the office, doctor and his staff, are very professional, and pleasant. The phone calls are always answered or returned. Same applied to emails, questions are answered. No “ghosting”, no delays. I love responsible people who take seriously what they do. Dr Mashkevich’s team is superb.

First week of June I had my surgery. Everything was done to make me feel comfortable. Karina (the nurse) was very attentive and helpful. Recovery was much easier than I expected. I prepared myself for really bad few weeks. Well, those weeks were not bad. They were uncomfortable. Pain was minimal. Mostly just discomfort. I was given cell phone numbers for the doctor himself and the nurse. I texted with questions few times, always got texts back, in a very timely manner. Especially considering how busy the doc is.  I was back to work in about 2 weeks.

I absolutely recommend Dr Mashkevich, he is the best imho

originalText.text:
There aren’t enough stars for this review!
It is my great privilege to write a review for Dr. Grigoriy Mashkevich. It is, indeed, a rarity, to have a doctor with the intelligence, competence, skill, instinct, confidence, warmth and personality that Dr. Mashkevich exudes.
Every appointment,  from the first consultation, to the surgery and then the follow ups were nothing short of perfect. I am absolutely thrilled with my results!! Thank you Dr. Grigoriy Mashkevich!!
Also, a gigantic shout out to the entire office staff, surgical team and post op team, who are all equally as impressive.

Simply THE BEST OF THE BEST!

originalText.text:
Dr. Mashkevech is not just a skilled doctor, he’s a true artist of transformation. From the moment I walked into his clinic, his genuine kindness and compassionate nature made me feel like I was in the best hands possible. His expertise goes beyond medical mastery; he has an innate ability to restore not only physical features but also a person’s sense of self-worth.

Under Dr. Mashkevech’s care, my lips and neck underwent a metamorphosis that can only be described as awe-inspiring artistry. His meticulous attention to detail, combined with a commitment to preserving a natural appearance, resulted in enhancements that seamlessly blend with my own features. It’s as if he used his skills to highlight my beauty in the most subtle yet profound way.

Dr. Mashkevech’s approach is truly unique because he genuinely cares about his patients. He took the time to understand my personal goals and concerns, ensuring that the entire journey was tailored to my needs. His work not only boosted my confidence but also reignited a sense of empowerment that I thought was lost.

In a world where cosmetic procedures often focus solely on appearance, Dr. Mashkevech’s holistic approach sets him apart. He is a master of his craft, a compassionate physician, and an artist who uses his skills to unveil the innate beauty within each individual. If you’re seeking a transformative experience that celebrates your uniqueness, I wholeheartedly recommend placing your trust in the gifted hands of Dr. Mashkevech.

Mara LaViola
